panel.name: im
panel.label: IM & logs

check_box.name: online_visibility
check_box.label: Only my friends and groups can see when I am online

panel.text: Click to open your SL email settings web page

check_box.name: open_on_incoming_check
check_box.label: Open new IM session as soon as someone starts typing to you
check_box.tool_tip: When enabled and while not in away/busy/auto-reply mode, this feature will cause a new IM session tab to be opened as soon as another resident starts typing a first IM to you (i.e. even before they send that IM).

button.name: busy_response_help
button.tool_tip: Click for info about the auto-response message.

panel.string:
The busy mode auto-response is sent in reply to new IM sessions initiated by others while you are set busy or when the auto-reply mode is enabled. The auto-response message is prefixed with 'Busy mode auto-response:' when you are set Busy, or with 'Auto-response:' when the auto-reply mode is enabled.
If you check the 'Also when away' option, then the busy mode auto-response message is sent as well in reply to new IM sessions initiated by others while you are set away. In this case however, the auto-response message is prefixed with 'Away mode auto-response:'.

check_box.name: busy_response_when_away
check_box.label: Also when away
check_box.tool_tip: When this box is checked, the busy mode auto-response is also sent in reply to new IM sessions initiated by others while you are set away. In this case, the auto-response message is prefixed with 'Away mode auto-response: '.

spinner.name: snooze_spinner
spinner.label: Snooze duration for group IM sessions:
spinner.tool_tip: You may close group IM sessions with a 'Snooze' button instead of closing them definitively with the 'X' button (which leaves the IM sessions server-side and lasts until you log off). When doing so, the IMs to the snoozed groups will not cause a new session floater/tab to get reoppened for the duration (in minutes) configured here. A duration of 0 entirely disables the snoozing feature (making it unavailable from the Group IM floater).

check_box.name: log_instant_messages
check_box.label: Save a log of instant messages on my computer

check_box.name: log_server_fetch
check_box.label: Fetch group log from server
check_box.tool_tip: On grids where this feature is available, you may fetch the past (recent) log for group IM sessions (in excess of your local log file) by checking this box.

check_box.name: log_open_in_built_in_browser
check_box.label: 'View log' in built-in browser
check_box.tool_tip: When the 'Load and show the backlog' setting in the 'Common options' below is checked, a 'View Log...' button becomes available in the IM panel, allowing to open the conversation past log into a browser or editor. If this settings is also checked, then the log will be opened in the built-in web browser instead of in an external program.

check_box.name: log_chat
check_box.label: Save a local chat log on my computer

check_box.name: log_chat_timestamp
check_box.label: Show timestamps in local chat log

check_box.name: log_chat_IM
check_box.label: Show incoming IM in local chat log

spinner.name: backlog_size
spinner.label: Backlog size:
spinner.tool_tip: This is the maximum size (in kilobytes) of the backlog loaded and shown.

check_box.name: logfile_name_resident
check_box.label: Omit ' Resident' in filename
check_box.tool_tip: In SL, new avatar accounts have their last name set to 'Resident' while old accounts got a true last name. If you check this box, the log filenames will not include ' Resident', which should allow to share the same log files directory with v3 viewers (but not with v1 and old v2 viewers).
